import sys
sys.dont_write_bytecode = True
import uvicorn
from main import app

# Test that the app can be created and routers are accessible
print(''Testing FastAPI app initialization...'')
print(f''App title: {app.title}'')
print(f''Available routes: {len(app.routes)}'')

# Check if auth routes are available
auth_routes = [route for route in app.routes if hasattr(route, ''path'') and ''/auth'' in route.path]
print(f''Auth routes found: {len(auth_routes)}'')
for route in auth_routes:
    if hasattr(route, ''path'') and hasattr(route, ''methods''):
        print(f''  - {route.methods} {route.path}'')

print(''SUCCESS: App initialization complete without SQLAlchemy errors'')

Bash(PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 python -c "
print(''GODS FINAL SAFETY CHECK: Complete System Verification'')
print(''='' * 60)

# Test 1: Complete Application Stack
try:
    from main import app
    route_count = len(app.routes)
    print(f''âœ“ Application Stack: {route_count} routes loaded successfully'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âœ— Application Stack FAILED: {e}'')
    exit(1)

# Test 2: All Model Imports Without Conflicts
try:
    from models import *
    print(''âœ“ Model Registry: All models imported without conflicts'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âœ— Model Registry FAILED: {e}'')
    exit(1)

# Test 3: UserRole Namespace Resolution
try:
    from models import UserRole, TourUserRole
    user_roles = [r.value for r in UserRole]
    tour_roles = [r.value for r in TourUserRole]
    
    assert ''moderator'' in user_roles, ''UserRole missing MODERATOR''
    assert ''all'' in tour_roles, ''TourUserRole missing ALL''
    assert ''all'' not in user_roles, ''UserRole contaminated with ALL''
    
    print(f''âœ“ Namespace Resolution: UserRole={user_roles}, TourUserRole={tour_roles}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âœ— Namespace Resolution FAILED: {e}'')
    exit(1)

# Test 4: Critical Relationship Models
try:
    from models.user import User
    from models.push_notification import PushSubscription, PushNotification, NotificationSettings
    from models.review import Review
    from models.message import Message
    from models.conversation import Conversation
    from models.guided_tour import GuidedTour, TourStep, UserTourProgress, TourFeedback
    
    print(''âœ“ Relationship Models: All critical models accessible'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âœ— Relationship Models FAILED: {e}'')
    exit(1)

# Test 5: Router Integration
try:
    # Check that push notifications router is actually included
    auth_routes = [str(route.path) for route in app.routes if hasattr(route, ''path'') and ''auth'' in str(route.path)]
    push_routes = [str(route.path) for route in app.routes if hasattr(route, ''path'') and ''push'' in str(route.path)]
    
    assert len(auth_routes) > 0, ''No auth routes found''
    assert len(push_routes) > 0, ''No push notification routes found''
    
    print(f''âœ“ Router Integration: {len(auth_routes)} auth routes, {len(push_routes)} push routes'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âœ— Router Integration FAILED: {e}'')
    exit(1)

print()
print(''DIVINE SAFETY CHECK RESULT: ALL SYSTEMS PERFECT'')
print(''The gods find no fault in the architecture'')
")
